name: Mowed Down (Poop Dollar)
description:
Mow That Lawn!

Use your lawn mowing skills to beat this art racer type game! Mow the outline shown and get above 70% accuracy in each of the 6 levels to win the game. Post your high score!

Controls DescriptionControlAccelerate
Up Arrow Key || W
Turn Left
Left Arrow Key || A
Turn Right
Right Arrow Key || D
Brake/Reverse
Down Arrow Key || S
ContinueSpacebar || Return || Enter
Main Menu
Escape

Tips

You can only turn while moving and you turn faster the faster you are going. You will have 5 seconds to see the outline and 15 seconds to mow. The more of the outline you mow, the more points you get, but be careful because you also lose points for grass mowed outside the outline or if you fail a level!

Made for Autumn Cozy Jam 2022 with the mechanic "One room only" using the autumn glow color palette.

*All assets are original made by me except for the sound effects.
